sourcesContent:
import EditProduct from './EditProduct' const Product = (props) => { const product = props.product const {id, productName,description, canExpire,expiryDate, category, price, special} = product; return(

{showModal ? : null}

Name: {productName}

Description: {description}

Expiry: {expiryDate || 'No Expiry'}

Category: {category}

Price: {price}

special: {special}

 ) } export default Product
